name: Unknown Dungeon
description:
Unknown Dungeon is a rpg and rogue-like game with lots of interesting activities. From helping people in a village and doing guild quests to solving puzzles and fighting difficult bosses in the dungeon. Each player can find something fascinating to do.


RPG Features

  • Playable characters can be upgraded making them more effective
  • The game has interesting storyline with lots of quests and dialogues
  • Each character has its own abilities, weapons and combat styles
  • The world has lots of peaceful explorable areas as well as dangerous ones
  • The game has pretty complex combat system


Rogue-like Features

  • The dungeon has randomly generated floors with unique rooms and monsters
  • There are lots of playable characters presented in the game
  • The deeper you go in the dungeon the harder will be the enemies and the better loot you will get
  • The only things you can get out of the dungeon are experience and local currency
  • Some rooms may contain monsters, other — puzzles
